effect_entries.effect: Can call any move except for struggle and itself.

Selects any move at random and uses it.  Moves the user already knows are not eligible.  Assist, meta, protection, and reflection moves are also not eligible; specifically, assist, chatter, copycat, counter, covet, destiny bond, detect, endure, feint, focus punch, follow me, helping hand, me first, metronome, mimic, mirror coat, mirror move, protect, quick guard, sketch, sleep talk, snatch, struggle, switcheroo, thief, trick, and wide guard will not be selected by this move.

This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.
effect_entries.short_effect: Randomly selects and uses any move in the game.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
挥动手指刺激自己的大脑，
从所有的招式中
任意使出１个。

指をふり　自分の　脳を　刺激して
すべての　技の　なかから
どれか　１つを　くりだす。

The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain
into randomly using nearly any move.

Chi la usa fa di no con il dito e stimola il cervello
a usare a caso una delle tante mosse esistenti.

El usuario mueve un dedo y estimula su cerebro 
para usar al azar casi cualquier movimiento.

Bewegt Finger, um das Gehirn zu stimulieren.
Wählt zufällig eine Attacke aus.

Le lanceur agite un doigt et stimule son cerveau pour
utiliser presque n’importe quelle capacité au hasard.

揮動手指刺激自己的大腦，
從全部的招式中
隨機選出１招使出。

손가락을 흔들어 자신의 뇌를
자극해서 모든 기술 중
어느 하나를 날린다.

ゆびをふり　じぶんの　のうを　しげきして
すべての　わざの　なかから
どれか　１つを　くりだす。

指をふり　自分の　脳を　刺激して
すべての　技の　なかから
どれか　１つを　くりだす。
